name: Abraxas
description:
A shoot em' up game where you fight off viruses in your computer! Consists of 3 levels of increasing difficulty. Use the arrow keys to move, Z keys to shoot and X key to use a bomb. 
There are some glitches I am aware of (enemies somehow respawing after dying is one) but I am unsure of how to fix these right now.

Any feedback is greatly appreciated!

Title Screen and Cover Image art by me (Ashleigh Kennedy)
Assets made by me in Playscii created by JP LeBreton (http://vectorpoem.com/playscii/)

Title Screen theme by bensound.com (https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/sci-fi)
